name: Baby Redemption
description: Baby Redemption is a high paced rogue-like shooter where you have to save babies in glorious intense slow-motion action. Weapons, bullets, babies, fun and bullet-time. What more do you need?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1,2 GHz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 265MB Storage: 200 MB available space
